name: Frogvival
description:
You are what you eat indeed and in Frogvival you can really experience that assessment.



Frogvival is a survival game where you can devour animals to mutate into them! You can gather the food to cook it, you can craft weapons and objects. You can build, you can fight, you can explore and create your own world full of frogs!



In Frogvival you can:
  • Build your house, constructing different floors and walls
  • Decorate your house with 50+ items like bookshelves, carpets, and paintings
  • Survival on the swamp
  • Cook delicious meals to fulfill never-ending hunger
  • Explore the wide world around you!
